verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Now the day is over, Night is drawing nigh, Shadows of the evening Steal across the sky.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Jesus, give the weary Calm and sweet repose; With Thy tend'rest blessing May our eyelids close.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Grant to little children Visions bright of Thee; Guard the sailors tossing On the deep blue sea.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thro' the long night-watches May Thine angels spread Their white wings above me, Watching round my bed.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: When the morning wakens, Then may I arise Pure and fresh and sinless In Thy holy eyes. Amen.
